text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: After that, err… Uhhh… Hmmm…
On a holiday, I spotted Special Week who was at her wits end, with a troubled look. As I reached out to her…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san! I'm trying to rehearse guiding a sightseeing tour.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Mom will be coming here for a visit soon. She said she wanted to see if I've settled in here!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I thought I'd show her the attractions here, and tell her "I know this town like the back of my hand!"

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's why I've been running through my tour guide for her…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But it's still not quite up to snuff. Ahaha~!
choice_data_list: I can help out if you want.
I can help out if you want.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: R-Really!? Waah! Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Then, can you play the role of my Mom? That'll work nicely as a practical training!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hurray! Let's have a fun time together, Mom-of-the-Day!
And just like that, Special Week's sightseeing tour kicked off, but then…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uhhhhh… this way, maybe? Or the other way?…I'm pretty sure that's the right way, yeah.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-It's all good! If I'm reading my phone right, the mall should be just a few steps ahead!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Wait, what? Isn't this… Ah, I knew it! I was so absorbed in reading the map I didn't notice.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! This is a place I often stop by.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It's so quiet around here. I get to spend my time here at leisure.
choice_data_list: You like this spot, don't you.
You like this spot, don't you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I do! Although the scenery here isn't the same as Hokkaido…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I like to think that Mom is somewhere under the same sky.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That thought makes me feel motivated and all charged up…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Anyways, we'll visit the shopping arcade afterwards! There's a store selling delicious pickled vegetables~!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: This way, this way! In fact, there's a shortcut around here…

text_block_list.name: Elder Greengrocer Lady
text_block_list.text: My, Spe-chan! Are you dropping by again today for some more pickles?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes! The usual special pickled vegetables, please!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe ♪ The pickles here are crunchy delicacies!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Aha! Speaking of specially made…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ta-da! My specially made mix ed juice!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: A one-and-only flavor made from the self-serving bar! Its taste is something to look forward to~ ♪
A cup filled with a brown liquid was placed on the table. However, it looked nothing like juice…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whenever I come here to study for my tests with El-chan and the others, we'd make sure we prepare a cup of this!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whoever falls asleep, or answers a question wrong… will have to gulp it down!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Well, most of the time it's me who ends up drinking this. Ahahahaha…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It tastes as "Ewww~~!!" as you can imagine. But still… I like this juice!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Together, we share moments of chatter, laughter, and excitement. And this juice… is a blend of these pleasant feelings.
choice_data_list: Then… I better give this a taste!
Then… I better give this a taste!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Go on and gulp it down, if you please! I'll order a carrot hamburger steak for you to help get rid of the bad taste.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Unlike the steak Mom used to make, which has the taste of home, the steak here is thrillingly delicious!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe♪ Guess I'll order another one for myself!…Excuse me, one carrot hamburger steak please!
After the meal, Special Week continued her tour of the town.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (♪ Humming ♪) It's already evening, huh. Let's head back home~…Hol-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ahhhhhhhhhhh!!!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The attractions! They entirely slipped my mind!! Before I knew it, the only places we visited are those I'd often go to!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I totally did not notice… What am I gonna do…!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Mom said she wanted to see if I've settled in here… She's gonna be disappointed with a tour like this.
choice_data_list: It's pretty convincing that ou have indeed settled in.
It's pretty convincing that ou have indeed settled in.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: B-But… There are also riversides and arcades up in Hokkaido.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So I figured… if I show her the unique spots here, she'd be more relieved.
choice_data_list:
She has got to be relieved seeing you 
just as accustomed to living here.

She has got to be relieved seeing you 
just as accustomed to living here.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, right… I was completely new to this place back when I just got here, but now I've pretty much settled in.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, thank you for reminding me what's more important!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Alright! I'm gonna delight Mom with a tour that reflects the current me~!
( Gwwarrrrr~ ~ )

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uwaah, right as I lighten up, my stomach butted in… A-Ahahahaha…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uhh… Ah, yes! How about we visit just one more place while we're at it?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: To my favourite supersize ramen place we go!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You heard that right! They serve what's called the "Supersize Mega Deluxe Ramen",

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Come now, Trainer-san! Let's get going!
…Determined to stop her at all costs for fear that this overeating might take its toll on he races, I chased after her in a fluster.
